mapper.update: update tb_certify_account t set t.login_id = #{loginID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.login_time = sysdate, t.modify_time = sysdate, t.modify_id = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, t.modify_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t.login_ip = #{loginIP,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_certify_login_log (id, login_id, account_num, user_id, user_name, login_time, login_ip) values (SEQ_tb_certify_login_log.Nextval, #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{loginIP,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select count(1) from tb_certify_dept t where t.company_name_sim = #{companySIM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select q.id,q.name,q.type,q.val url,q.parent_id pid from (select * from tb_certify_resource p where p.id in ( select distinct t.id from tb_certify_resource t connect by prior t.parent_id = t.id start with t.id in ( select distinct b.id from tb_certify_reso_acco a, tb_certify_resource b where a.account_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.resource_id = b.id))) q connect by prior q.id = q.parent_id start with q.parent_id = 0 order siblings by q.sort asc
